description: large footed cup with two handles; landscape with man carrying buckets on a yolk; woman behind milking cow; rocks with flowers and flying bird above at R on opposite side; foliate design on handles and around base
dimension: 5 1/2 x 6 x 9 3/4 in. (13.97 x 15.24 x 24.77 cm) (including handles)
inscription:
Inscription and Label

on base, in blue: [H/ I E/ 1715]
markings: on base, on label: [43D]; on base: collector\'s label
title: Posset pot
